original: 南陽郡博望縣人，曹魏將領。長年任襄陽太守，關羽出兵北伐，圍呂常於襄陽，呂常堅守到關羽退軍。
text: Born in Bowang County, Nanyang County, General Cao Wei. For many years, he served as the prefect of Xiangyang, Guan Yu sent troops to the northern expedition, surrounded Lu Chang in Xiangyang, and Lu Chang stood firm to Guan Yu and retired.
